name: vapor
description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) in vaporwave style.

name: vapour
description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) in vapourwave style.

name: earrape
args: <YouTube URL | video name> [Gain dB] [Bass Boost dB]
description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) in earrape style. WARNING: May be loud! I do not take responsibility for any hearing loss you inflict upon yourself :^)

name: play
description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) with no special effects.

name: midi
description: Synthesizes and plays a MIDI file. (Not all instruments are supported yet)

name: reverse
description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) in reverse.

name: lofi
description: Plays a YouTube video (by name or URL) with low quality.

name: queue
description: Shows the current queue of requested songs.

name: skip
description: Votes to skip the song that is currently playing.

name: forceskip
description: Forces the song that is currently playing to be skipped. (Admins only)

name: soundcloud
description: Plays a Soundcloud song given its URL.

name: vocaroo
description: Plays a Vocaroo sound file given its full URL.

name: repeat
description: Puts the current song in the queue on repeat.

name: sound
description: Plays a soundbite given its filename.

name: tts
description: Text-to-speech using the Moonbase Alpha voice (an implementation of DECtalk).

name: cas
description: Applies Content-Aware Scale to the attached image or the last image sent in the channel.

name: wide
description: Converts normal text into ï½—ï½‰ï½„ï½… ï½”ï½…ï½˜ï½”.

name: space
description: Converts normal text into s p a c e d  t e x t. `num` specifies how many spaces to put between each word, default is 1.

name: mocking
description: ThIs iS NoT A DeAd mEmE.

name: block
description: Converts normal text into ðŸ‡§ ðŸ‡± ðŸ‡´ ðŸ‡¨ ðŸ‡° ðŸ‡¾ text.

name: palindrome
description: Converts every word into a palindrome of itself.

name: vertical
description: Writes a message vertically as well as horizontally.

name: pyramid
description: Cleverly combines a word and a phrase.

name: graph
description: Graphs a mathematical function using Wolfram|Alpha.

name: latex
description: Renders LaTeX text.

name: ping
description: Pings the bot to check response time.

name: mfw
description: Returns a random reaction image from 4chan. Adding `nsfw` to the end will search both SFW and NSFW boards.

name: restart
description: Restarts the bot. [Bot owner only]

name: shutdown
description: Shuts down the bot. [Bot owner only]

name: invite
description: Sends a link to invite the bot to another Discord server.

name: songs
description: Sends a link to the Processed Songs page of VapourBot's website.

name: about
description: Sends a link to VapourBot's website.

name: help
description: Sends a link to this page.
